text: allahvaip parri ketta ennam ennum munahpikkana ankalaiyum, munahpikkana penkalaiyum, inaivaittu vanankum ankalaiyum, inaivaittu vanankum penkalaiyum, (allah) vetanai ceyvan. (Avvetanaiyin) ketu avarkal mel culantu kontu irukkiratu innum allah avarkal mitu kopam kontan; avarkalaic capittum vittan; avarkalukkaka narakattaiyum cittam ceytirukkinran - (atutan) cellumitankalil mikavum kettatu
